website_summaries.verdict: An affordable kit that includes all the basic tools to get started.
pros: Kit sits at a low price point
Quality metal hooks have a comfortable rubber grip and slide through most types of yarn with ease
Tools come in a convenient floral print case
Kit also includes yarn needles and stitch markers
cons: Crochet hooks are not labeled by size or letter

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am an absolute beginner and I have found this kit to be so helpful. Everything is just as pictured on here. I am now half-way done with a scarf and am so pleased to have this little kit by my side. I don't have anything to compare it to, but I find these crochet hooks to be very comfortable in my hands. They appear to be sturdy and I can imagine them holding up nicely for years to come. I can't wait to continue using these, because I'm absolutely hooked (pun definitely intended) on crocheting!
customer_reviews.author: NAD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome package. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging and delivery with Amazon Prime. Love my new products. I ordered the package of mini yarns, crochet needles, and beginners guide to crocheting. I used to crochet over 10 years ago. I've decided to take it up again with the advice of my friend. I love the ergonomic needles. It helps with carpel tunnel. I am pleased with my products. Everything is perfect as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ExoticAromas

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced my ten year old metal hooks with these. I'm making a blanket and I tend to crochet until my arms starts to really hurt. I've wanted to try ergonomic hooks but never took the plunge -- I should have. These are lovely to work with. Despite having my hand further up, I don't clench the hook as hard with reduces tension in my arm and neck. The bag the hooks come in is adorable, and the extras are a nice bonus. Only downside might be that the hooks are only marked with their measurements and not letter size. I think most patterns use both though.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: I love these! What a great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these! What a great value! You get a lot for your money with this product, & what an adorable little pouch to keep it all in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product. The best crochet needles I tried so far. They are smooth and slide through the yarn. And very comfortable to hold. The case is sweet and I love the needles' holder. I accidentally got two, but I liked it so much, that I gave the second one as a present. All and all, a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Omna Aharony

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great set!! I was not paid for this review neither did I receive my product at a discount. I just bought it off of Amazon. It's really a fantastic deal. If you go to Walmart crochet hooks similar to these are seven or eight bucks each. This is a horse that plus stitch markers plus needles plus a cute little case for less than 10 bucks!! They are perfect!! Well made, very sturdy and totally cute. I love it! So glad I bought.
customer_reviews.author: KansasKat.

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I bought this was because I heard that these crochet hooks are very comfortable when working on projects
customer_reviews.text: The pouch, hooks, needles, and stitch markers all came in this set. The main reason I bought this was because I heard that these crochet hooks are very comfortable when working on projects. These in particular did not feel to different from a regular aluminum crochet hook. I dont dislike them, they do the job. But I would not brag about these to anyone really- they sort of feel like a cover over the metal. It feels hard, but you arent feeling the metal exactly on your hand. These hooks work great! But if you are intending on buying them for a comfortable grip and cushioning- I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I've crocheted for 35+ years, so I've been through some hooks now, LOL. I've always used either plastic hooks, stainless steel (for thread works) or aluminum. This was my first set with the comfort grip, and I love them! Been using them for over a year now and they hold up great! The bag is awesome to keep everything contained. The added stitch markers and needles were a plus, since I tend to lose them easily...but not anymore with the handy bag! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Conner

customer_reviews.title: but some fine sandpaper fixed it easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these sets, one for me and one as a gift. Only one hook had a small rough spot that would occasionally catch, but some fine sandpaper fixed it easily. I crochet about 3 hours a day and I love these things.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this set. Great quality and costs about a third of what you would pay for all of the items included at a craft store. Much easier on your hands than wooden and aluminum hooks, especially if you crochet almost daily like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Crocheters with Arthritis or Carpal Tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who crochets frequently should have these hooks! They're great for those who enjoy crocheting for hours but suffer from arthritis, stiff joints, overuse injuries, etc. My mom developed some wrist & forearm pain because she crochets so frequently, and after I bought her these, she can crochet for much longer! She loves the grips on them, too, and the convenient carrying pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: My first and possibly last set
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of hooks I bought and I don't know if this hobby is for me but they're nice hooks. It comes in a small case for carrying them which is good because sometimes I have to be outside for totally normal reasons and it helps that they're mobile. The hooks themselves while not bad aren't amazing either but I don't know if this hobby is for me because the reception to the pot holders and mittens I made for my kids was lukewarm at best but it's not their fault it's that thieving usurper Brent what turned them against me.
customer_reviews.author: Good Ole JR

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like using the items but the rubber part is slippery a little. The head is not as sharp so at times it is hard to stitch the thread. They colors are great and it is easy to tell your size via the color. I am satisfied with it and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: UNyque B

customer_reviews.title: The crochet hooks feel nice in my hand and are good enough for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The crochet hooks feel nice in my hand and are good enough for my purposes. I mainly needed a variety of crochet hooks to do finishing work on my knitting projects. These do the job and I like that it came with a storage bag to stay organized. The extra needles and markers are a nice bonus and I am sure I will use them since these small items are so easy to lose. I think of these as back supplies and are happy to have them added in!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 I've spent!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this set. I bought it as a replacement set for my missing pieces and didn't have stich savers or neddles. I have never felt something more comfortable in my hands. I highly recommend this for anyone who crochets. Even beginners. I plan on getting this set for anyone is my life who crochets.
customer_reviews.author: Moffett Family

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. I do not crotchet, but rather knit using two needles. The crotchet hooks seem to be of a nice quality, and I like that they are different colors. I am unsure as to if they will last or not. The contents of the package are just as they are advertised. However I am let down by the quality of the pouch itself. It is of very poor crinkly material, I'm almost embarrassed to give it as a gift because of this. And I don't anticipate that the zipper in it will last though regular use before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: ls r.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: These hooks were decent quality but I did not realize that they didn't have the letters printed on them until they arrived. I prefer to have both the mm and letters printed on them. Also one was a bit bent upon arrival but might have happened in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Joy

customer_reviews.title: Some snag the yarn
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner crocheter but I do know when a hook is not properly made. Two of these fellas have snag spots on them so that they grab cotton yarn. Very frustrating. I do like the handles as they are soft and easy on my arthritic hands. Regardless, the 3.5 and 4.0 mm cannot be easily used due to the snagging.
customer_reviews.author: True Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this set for the yarn needles. I am a knitter and needed some new ones. This kit was so afforadably priced I decided to get this kit. I figured if I ever got the urge to crochet I’d be set. Well, two months later I am crocheting! The hooks are easy to hold. I have no experience with other hooks so I can only go off what I know. You’ll be able to do a variety of projects with these hooks. You are completely set up for crocheting with the kit. The only thing you’ll have to provide is the yarn as scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Mlucas001

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little package. These hooks replace my red heart ones and I like these because of the padding. My other ones are metal and the end always digs into my palm. I am very happy with this purchase. It even comes with the handy little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love,  love, love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect. They are startit the the handles do not slide or break off the case is beautiful and true to color it's compact and small enough to stick in any bag. I love the variety size of crochet needles and the stitch counters are easy to use their not cheaply made nothing in this pack has broke and I use them extensively. I would highly recommend these for anybody who crochets. They're perfect or konami glee my hands do not a hurts their easy to hold that handles are not slippery at all. They've grasped the yarn perfectly fair smooth and a slide perfectly when your crocheting.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie H

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted a set of ergonomic hooks. These are not ergonomic at all. The plastic is extremly hard and the seams from the plastic mold are sharp and dig into your hand. Obviously very cheaply made. The bag they come in is also cheap and flimsy. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a make your own cacti package from Joanne's on a whim and realized crocheting is a lot harder than I imagined, especially when a total beginner starts off trying to make 3 cactus plushies. Thankfully, with the help of the internet and these much improved needles, the cacti were a success! I absolutely could not get anywhere with the needle the package came with so these were really helpful and less tiring on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Im a beginner to crocheting and I love this set. Its perfect because it has everything I would need to start my first project. I learn by watching Youtube videos and when they talked about needing needles to finish up, i was glad that i didnt need to go out and get it because the set already comes with plenty! I havent used all the hooks yet, but the one I have is very comfortable to hold and use. Plus, the case is really cute and it fits everything. If I could recommend something, I would say to add a small scissor.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: I hated them
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product. The handles are sticky and don't feel good. I wish they would have a wooden option, but I couldn't find one. I bought the bigger sizes from the same brand made out of would and I love them, but the plastic version is just nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: JN ♠️

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The little pouch is even cuter then pictured, nice assortment of items needed to crochet. A good value, especially if you are just learning, variety of hook sizes saves an extra trip to the store, and if all of these were purchased separately, the price would be at least $40.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fredregill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or travel
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners who want various sizes without breaking the bank. The grips are not as soft and thick as the Boye ergonomic set I have, but they are still better than the traditional style. The grips are on tight, and I have no issues with any rough spots. It's also a great travel set given the price. Easy to replace if lost.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The reason I gave three stars, is for the little zippered case. The zipper was broken upon arrival. Very cheap. And the handles on the crochet needles are not as big as I expected. Not much larger than an actual metal crochet hook. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Vardaman

customer_reviews.title: cute set
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ergonomic crochet hook set and let me simply say I am hooked. I love that I bought this for myself and I don't ever plan to go back to non-ergonomic hooks. These truly help me be able to work longer and enjoy my projects more. This also game with the cute carry case which I did not have before and I have the darning needles and can add a small pair of scissors to the bag. I would say this is a perfect gift for the crocheter in your family.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit! It's affordable and has most everything you need to begin crocheting. The bag is cute and has some room in it too, I'm able to fit some thread scissors and child-size scissors in there as well. You won't find a better kit for a better price anywhere. My only complaint is that my purple hook has a noticeable seam on the rubber handle, and sometimes after crocheting for a long time it can rub against my hands and be irritating. None of the other hooks have this issue though so I think it's still worth a full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for a beginner like me. It has all the sizes you need. The handles are comfortable which makes the crocheting more enjoyable because my hand does not cramp up. I like the bag, it holds everything nicely. I just added a small pair of scissors to mine to keep all my tools in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Em S

customer_reviews.title: I love these so far
customer_reviews.text: I love these so far. The hooks are lightweight and comfortable to hold. They are a little shorter than the boye one I have, but I like that because I have small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Savitz

customer_reviews.title: a bit small for my hands but ...
customer_reviews.text: (This account is under my son's name) A bit small for my hands but then I have really large hands and long fingers. I had to hand these off to my best friend as she has smaller hands. She loved them. If you have average size hands then you'll have no problem with the size of these hooks. (seriously mine are freakishly large - I've only met one guy who had larger hands) The rest of the kit is fantastic. I'm sold on the stitch holders that resemble safety pins and I love the case that holds everything. (I gave my bf the crochet hooks but held onto the case and the rest of the kit)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Moore

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: I was really afraid these would be cheap and flimsy, but they aren't. Cute little bag, just right to tuck in when I carry my crochet work, and love the hooks. Very easy to use and comfortable. My only suggestion for improvement would be to make sure the letters were on the hooks, and milimeter numbers were larger and easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase. The case is a great size and I was even able to add a few hooks I already owned to it. The hooks are a comfortable silicone grip and the needles do a good job for their intended purpose. I am jus learning to crochet, so I do not have a lot of experience, but found this set pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie Sue Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip, comfortable but short
customer_reviews.text: Pros : Comfy, hooks work just like supposed too.. Cons : short (only about 5 inches) not the fault of the company that I have large hands so it can sit a bit uncomfortable after about an hour of crocheting. One hook was loose but I fixed with e-6000 (the smallest of the set) I have never used such a small hook as this was my first set after learning to crochet with an aluminum hook. Amazon fixed the issue though and I fixed the hook. Update review after more time spent using them. But for now good set.
customer_reviews.author: Love them...

customer_reviews.title: Snags
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, the bag is really cute! The problem that I have is that the hooks have snags on them that like to catch on the yarn. I just used a crystal mail fine to smooth them out.
customer_reviews.author: smithdv

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of crochet tools
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were very nice. I already had some mixed tools, but decided to get this so I could keep them together. The little case is very cute and helps keep things together. I have arthritis and these are easier to hold. Glad I got them. Will make my crochet crafts easier...I think. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Colley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these crochet hooks! I can use them for hours without any discomfort. The stitch markers are handy and a good size, and the blunt needles are very helpful. The small carrying bag is PERFECT. I take this entire set with me almost every day and aside from a stray thread around the zipper here or there, it has held up fine. This is a GREAT value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, snags the yarn
customer_reviews.text: Crochet hook has rough spots and snags the yarn, it is impossible to work with.
customer_reviews.author: doris wood

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised with the nice selection of ergonomic crochet hooks, blunt eye needles and yarn markers. It all came in a nice zippered bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Do not be fooled by "cute".
customer_reviews.text: Hooks need to be VERY SMOOTH or the yarn will not easily slide. I will not be able to use these. The handles and cute purse are very nice...but the actual hooks need to be smoother.....and NO INDICATION OF SIZE!!!!????
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I recently picked up crocheting and found out that I have arthritis at the same time. Who knew you could at 21? Anyways the hooks at hobby lobby weren’t cutting it anymore so I looked into these. My hands don’t hurt nearly as much when crocheting and the yarn stays on well. I haven’t had a problem with the year catching on the hook like in some of the reviews I read. Over all I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND VALUE
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been crocheting for years. With the onset of age and arthritis she thought she would try the crochet hooks with the large handles. She is amazed at this product. Not just the ease of the use but the wide range of sizes and the value. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: P.L. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Save your work!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for those who are beginners. Has everything you need. I love the tiny clips it comes with so you can easily save any crochet project and switch to a different one with the same needle.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Would repurchase!!
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner in crochet I absolutely love these. Comfortable and easy to keep a grip on. Appreciate the cute pouch to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife considering she loves to crochet. But the regular needles have always cramped up her hands. Once she started using these she couldn't put them down. She loves how now she can do all kinds of things with the different sizes that came in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I paid for and more. Get this if you are working with worsted weight yarn or thinner. I like the extras that come with it, and it's small and easy to store. The only downside is that a few of the gauges on the handles have worn off, but if you put them side by side, you should be able to tell what size you want/need.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: CUTE and a GREAT deal!
customer_reviews.text: I went to my local fabric/yarn store to pick up some ergonomic crochet needles and one was like almost eight dollars! Then I wanted to pick up a pack of stitch markers, another almost eight dollars. This set is extremely cute, and is a total steal for the money. Don't hesitate to buy! Super comfortable to hold and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: monicab

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle for the amount!! Only complaint is the rubber handles tend to slide off... A lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyssa

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed
customer_reviews.text: Great little case and all I need to start crocheting. I think they are only difficult for me to hold because I am new at crocheting. Love that they are color coded and come with all you need to start a new project.
customer_reviews.author: ungu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn with!
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning to crochet by watching YouTube videos, so I got these because they were cheap and got good reviews. I didn't want to spend a lot in case I couldn't catch on. They are very comfortable to hold and I'm glad I got them. They made it easy for me to learn and, while I'm no pro, I'm getting the hang of it and have a pretty good start on a baby blanket! Cute carrying case too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: Bought for wife and wife is happy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she has been very happy with these. She still can not crochet as long as she had before she had wrist problems but these helped her go longer than the normal ones that she had been using. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three cheers.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Now I can crochet again for hours instead of having to stop after 30 or 40 minutes and rest my hand. The little tote bag and the yarn needles are great too as I have a knack for losing stuff. If I keep it all together it will be where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: CQueener

customer_reviews.title: Crocheting in Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I crochet a lot in the winter, and sometimes my fingers cramp up. These ergonomic crochet hooks are a godsend! I can crochet much longer and they are very comfortable. They don't slide when I'm crocheting like the other steel or plastic hooks I have used. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Much more comfortable than the regular ones, especially if you have arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback to these is that I can't move the yarn quite as far down the needle as I'd like. When I'm crocheting, i move my loops away from the hook to yarn over. The handle interferes with that. Very comfortable to hold though! My hand would hurt with a regular metal hook.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Squires

customer_reviews.title: Love them ♡
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love these!! I just started crocheting again and these hooks have me hooked. They're easy to hold and there's a wide variety of sizes for many different products. The carrying case is super cute also. Nice, thick, and durable material!
customer_reviews.author: Ajallivanty

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the bag- it’s felt lined so I’m not too worried about the needles poking through if I’m too lazy to put them back in the plastic case. The hooks are so pretty, the handles are ergonomic, and it seems like the perfect starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: xoxojordan

customer_reviews.title: Break very easily
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this. The needles are definitely steel but the hooks are simply plastic painted to look like steel. I have snapped three of them since getting them three months ago. Great for people doing looser patterns but anyone who needs tight stitches (like amigurumi) forget it, they won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: So Great I've bought 3 more as gifts
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect and you cant beat the price. Great gift for any one who crochets. All my recipients think I spent all kinds of money on them and everyone loves the bag. The only complaint has been that the hook sizes can be difficult to read - my solution is to use a fine tip sharpie to mark in the grooves, problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Kailualuv

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: A really great set of all-purpose, ergonomic hooks! Comfortable in my arthritic hands, well made and the case is roomy enough to hold extras. Not to mention the cuteness factor of the bag. A very happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wade

customer_reviews.title: What a Lovely Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for anyone who crochets. I am a newbie. But as far as I can tell, there are varying hook sizes for all sorts of projects. :) The bag it comes in is really cute.. It's cheaper than a set from Wal-Mart and also includes stitch markers and yarn needles. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: The smallest size is still too big when I was making my doll... the holder is soso.. I don’t feel really comfortable with that plastic holder. I gave it up to use lol. Maybe is not for me
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bargain
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by the quality of all products provided. I really thought the price was too good to be true. Mostly bought it for the clips and needles, but the hooks are some sizes I was missing and they were very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for advanced and beginner
customer_reviews.text: This was not only great value as I saw something similar at a store for over $70! And this has everything needed to either begin or for myself that has arthritis when I crochet My daughter also began to learn and these were excellent for her to learn with.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: For me, these were the perfect size and fit. They are very comfortable to hold and I can crochet much faster because of the ease of the needle going in and out of the yard. This is an excellent set and I am so pleased that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have never used these hooks before but they are amazing. I have been using a 3mm hook on a very tedious project and found my hand was hurting often. With this hook my hand doesn't hurt. The stitch markers are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E

customer_reviews.title: Love these hooks:)
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have found these sooner. They make crocheting a lot easier on your hand. I had bought some of these kind individually before at a much higher price. I love these hooks and the little case. Needles work well too.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee drinker

customer_reviews.title: Great set in a cute case
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as good as expected. The pouch is cute and convenient. I've learned from a painful experience not to leave crochet hooks lying around and the pouch makes it so easy to care of that. I like that the yarn needles come in their own tiny case and the hooks have a separate bag. Very comfortable. I'm just getting into crocheting and the set is perfect for making different kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy_says

customer_reviews.title: These are a hand saver!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE! The price is amazing for the quality. I love the little bag super cute and small fits right in my purse. My hands were killing me while crocheting but the cushion grip on these has helped tremendously. Found these just in time to bang out some homemade Christmas gifts. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was honestly one of my best purchases that I’ve made in a while. Such a great value. The little pouch it comes with is the cutest and spacious enough for me to even throw in a few circular knitting needles and a pair of mini scissors in. I take the pouch with me when I’m on the go and know I’ll have some spare time to crochet or knit. It’s overall just such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first time purchase!
customer_reviews.text: sooo it's quarantine time which means I'm trying new hobbies, enter crocheting! this pack is so cute and such a good bargain for the price. it's my first time crocheting and I think these needles are great to learn on. Additionally, I've used them daily for like 3 weeks straight, no pain, no blisters and no ware or tear! the pouch it comes with is super cute and holds everything perfectly! also the accessories it comes with are helpful !
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Siaumau

customer_reviews.title: Useful set, not cute pouch.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great set. I'm only giving it 4 stars because the pouch not only doesn't look like the one in the picture. It looked old and dirty, which was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I love these. My wrists and fingers have become somewhat ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My wrists and fingers have become somewhat arthritic and I hadn't been crocheting much because it really caused a lot of pain in my hands and wrists. These make it so much easier to crochet, without aggravating my arthritis and causing me pain.
customer_reviews.author: StormRavn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort grip crochet set, great for my hands
customer_reviews.text: This kit worked out nicely. The hooks were more comfortable for my longer projects as I didn’t grip them too firmly. Also having a bigger supply of stitch markers and needles is always a plus! The case keeps it all together and is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: becklef

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was new to crochet and this set was super affordable and surprisingly well made. I love the included needles and stitch markers. The bag is big enough to hold all of the stuff plus a few more things, like a pen and some embroidery thread. I have used them a lot during the pandemic! Worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: D White

customer_reviews.title: great hooks at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I priced buying hooks one at a time and this is a seriously good deal to get you started in crocheting. I love the little bag and it comes with more yard needles than I'll ever need :) This item has a lot of positive reviews and you will understand why that is.
customer_reviews.author: LCgal

customer_reviews.title: Great crochet starter kit
customer_reviews.text: These crochet needles are great! High quality for the price, and I can tell that they will last me awhile. The case is super cute and soft. This is a great starter kit for anyone who's looking to get into crocheting and I think it's great for experienced crocheters too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. However when I purchased it a while back it was $10. Now it's over $20 which blows my mind. Either way, it's still a good value. The hooks are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley tilton

customer_reviews.title: Great small set! Perfect for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: The pouch is adorable, very vintage shabby chic vibe to it which i love.. It is small but it easily holds the hooks, stitch makers , and the tube of yarn needles that come inside it, with plenty of room for your added extras. It is a great portable size just add your own small scissors and toss it in your wip bag with your yarn. I would buy this again. Especially if creating a gift for a new crocheter.. who needs a good standard sized hook set. The grips on the hooks is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I’m learning to crochet so I figured I’d purchase needles that were easy to hold and maneuver. They are comfortable in the hand. Great quality. Fun colors. Pretty case to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: Francine M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Friend was going to purchase something similar in a store for 6 times as much and only get the hooks none of the extra stuff so I told her to let me look on Amazon and she likes these even better they did take a little longer to arrive and they were supposed to but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for the new crochet learner!
customer_reviews.text: I hope my Granddaughter loves these! I'll gift them with a pretty skein of yarn to encourage her to keep up the good work and continue to learn to crochet even better!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Howard

customer_reviews.title: Go Get It!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I ordered. Everything was in tact and beautiful. I have not used it yet but once I do I’ll leave an updated review. So far, I’d recommend it. It feels fabulous. I find it difficult to hold regular crochet needles so hopefully this will feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Roneillia Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to teach myself how to crochet. I had purchased a traditional aluminum set. Quickly realized the value of the thicker handles! Purchased this set and it is a great set for the price! Has all common sizes of hooks and the yarn “safety pins” are such a help!
customer_reviews.author: M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Colorful by size, in a neat little package to keep handy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking on Youtube to learn how to crochet, this cute little holder, keeps everything together and easy to get to, when you're Trying to learn this craft!
customer_reviews.author: eclectic

customer_reviews.title: i have bought 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: you get everything mentioned. just throw it in ur bag and go, or leave it in a place you know youll need it. i had to buy a backup set after my brother misplaced a hook, rats ate on another one, and somehow my bag got dyed red on end. All mishaps are of my own. so i store my hooks in one pouch and the other odd ball things in the other & keep on hooking! loving having hooks that are exactly the same!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well...I bought this for on the go projects. I was disappointed in the quality and feel. The hooks were very rough and the yarn did not smoothly glide as it should. I'm sending back and I'll try something else.
customer_reviews.author: jeddie97

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands. These hooks are great , they are easy on the fingers . I find I’m not squeezing as hard to hold on to them. Good range of sizes. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed to get started on crochet plus assortment of darning needles for finishing any project. All in a cute case
customer_reviews.author: Rita Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good one !
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product very much Good package and nice pouch made of cotton Very comfortable and easy to use Perfect choice for beginners Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Aanne

customer_reviews.title: Travel needle work kit
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in this kit. The hooks are a bit rough. The fabric pouch was a bit small and drab. The items included were what I was looking for in a travel knitting/crochet kit, but I had to find a smaller pair of scissors to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Are use these for creating all sorts of different little things around my house. The needles are especially useful for darning, and end stitching.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Bought again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this kit for my self. Now I buy them for friends. It's a slick and complete set. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit and love the case to store the hooks in.. It fits nicely in my purse as well if I am traveling and want to take some crafts...
customer_reviews.author: Mabby

customer_reviews.title: Crochet hooks
customer_reviews.text: These crochet hooks come in all the sizes that I needed. I like that it comes with all of the yarn needles and the stitch markers. It makes it easy to carry in the little carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Katz

customer_reviews.title: worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and these hooks have helped me continue to enjoy making projects. the design of the hooks prevents the yarn from creeping up the hook.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vengrouskie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, everything included is useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit so that I could try crocheting for the first time and I'm glad I did. I'm really happy with this purchase. The crochet hooks are nice to hold. I like that the needles are metal, in 3 sizes, and come in a plastic tube so that they don't poke through the case when they're not in use. The stitch markers are really helpful. This is a great kit and I ended up having everything I needed to start, no more and no less. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hooks, amazing price 👏
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hooks, amazing price. The hooks are great! They were so cheap, and came in a beautiful package, along with great yarn needles and stitch markers!
customer_reviews.author: MintChocolateChip

product_meta.title: WooCrafts Large-Eye Blunt Needles Yarn Knitting Plus Crochet Hooks Set with Case,Ergonomic Handle Crochet Hooks Needles for Arthritic Hands.Best Gift!
product_meta.description:
9 Pieces Large-eye Blunt Needles Steel Yarn Knitting Needles Sewing Needles + Ergonomic Grip Crochet Hooks Set Needles in Case

The large eye blunt needles are good for weaving in ends and sewing up seams on your knit and crochet projects. 

9pcs Crochet hooks with smooth finish and soft grip ergonomic handles.Great for Beginners, Intermediate or more Experienced Crocheters. The ergonomic handles made of soft rubber allow you to crochet for longer periods of time without experiencing cramps, sore or tired fingers. Fantastic for Arthritic or Carpul Tunnel Syndrom as you will have less stress on joints and wrists making crocheting much easier.

PERFECT GIFT - This crochet set makes a fantastic gift for craft lovers of all ages and experience. Your loved ones will be able to crochet for hours with comfort and ease, they will thank you for thinking of them. These crochet hooks are perfect for making afghans, baby blankets, hats, scarves and even your little crafters will enjoy making Loom Bracelets for hours as well as enjoy the bright colors they come in. 

WHY BUY THIS SET OVER THE OTHERS? Because - this is the ONLY Steel Blunt Needles with Crochet Hook Set in US. Try and search for yourself.
feature_bullets: ★★If you got this bargain.You would NEVER regret it!!! The included 9 pieces large-eye yarn needles alone is worth $4.99,you can search it on amazon★★ You get Ergonomic Crochet Hooks,Yarn Needles,Stitch Markers & Case...whole set now! These large eye Nickel-Plated Steel blunt yarn needles are good for weaving in ends and sewing up seams on your crochet and knitting projects. You get 9 pieces needles in three different SIZE( 5.2 cm,6 cm,7 cm) that work great for different weighted yarn.

9pcs Ergonomic Grip,Non-Slip Handles Crochet Hooks measured in metric,The sizes are B(2.0mm),C(2.5mm), D(3.0mm), E(3.5)mm,G(4.0)mm,7(4.5mm),H(5.0)mm,I(5.5)mm,and J(6.0mm). about 5.5inch long.The Soft rubber handles make the crochet hook very comfortable to use even for long periods of time.Complete set for crochet lovers.

This all-in-one kit would make a perfect gift for anyone who is learning to crochet, a beginner just starting out, or a seasoned crocheter on the go. It is also an ideal gift for any craft lover; we wouldn't blame you if you kept it for yourself!
All Accessories Included: 9 Pieces Large-eye Blunt Needles Steel Yarn Sewing Needles,9 Pieces Crochet Hooks, Knitting Stitch Markers and Crochet Hook Case
Lifetime Replacement Guarantee for Crochet Hooks and Large-Eye Blunt Steel Yarn Needles !!!
